sentences.en: A patchwork quilt is a good way of using up scraps of material.
sentences.cn: 做杂拼花布棉被是利用零碎布料的好办法.

sentences.en: Airing a quilt is a romance, a luxury.
sentences.cn: 晒被是很浪漫的一回事, 奢侈的浪漫.

sentences.en: He really looked like one who was serious about airing his quilt.
sentences.cn: 看来,他倒是个认真晒被的人.

sentences.en: It was too warm. Sunlight was slanting on to the quilt.
sentences.cn: 实在太暖和, 阳光并非正中的照着,斜斜对正棉被.

sentences.en: Mary saved up pieces of cloth to make a quilt.
sentences.cn: 玛丽存了几块布留作棉被用.
母亲昨天补了一床被子.

sentences.en: Quilting a bed cover can be laborious.
sentences.cn: 缝制一个床罩会很费力的。

sentences.en: Sleep deserted him and he kicked the quilt aside and sat up.
sentences.cn: 他不睡了,一脚踢开了被子,他坐了起来.

sentences.en: The cold made Xiangzi - just out from his warm quilt - gasp.
sentences.cn: 祥子刚从热被窝里出来,不住的吸溜气儿.

sentences.en: The design on this quilt cover is quite elegant.
The patient sat wrapped in a quilt.
The quilt has pretty, scalloped edges and intricate quilting.
sentences.cn: 这条被子有漂亮的荷叶饰边，而且绗缝活做得也很精致。

sentences.en: The quilt is not thick enough to protect him from the cold.
sentences.cn: 被子的厚度不足以为他御寒.

sentences.en: Through my tea - colored glasses , I saw the man patting his quilt.
sentences.cn: 见到那人一边用手拍打被子.

sentences.en: Trembling with fear, he threw himself down on the bed and covered his head with the quilt.
sentences.cn: 他吓得发抖, 趴在床上,用被子蒙住了头.

sentences.en: Yes, airing a quilt can also be so dirty, mundane and unromantic.
sentences.cn: 是的, 晒被也可以如此肮脏琐碎毫不浪漫.

words.tran_cn: 被上缝花纹的缝法；缝被子

phrases.tran_cn: 拼布床单；用小块布缝缀的被罩

trans.tran_en: a warm thick cover for a bed, made by sewing two layers of cloth together, with feathers or a thick material in between them

trans.tran_cn: 缝（被），用垫料填塞后缝拢，东拼西凑地做，用摘抄等方法编辑
trans.tran_en: If you quilt, or if you quilt a piece of fabric, you make a quilt

trans.tran_cn: 东拼西凑地编，加软衬料后缝制
